pageContext.claim: “It's a good thing I have a good relationship with every one [the leaders of the G20] of them — Modi — you saw that.”
pageContext.analysis: Since the president announced he would pull the U.S. out of the Paris Climate Accord, many European leaders, including the president of France and German chancellor, have publicly distanced themselves from him. It's certainly a stretch to suggest that relations between the U.S. and Europe are as strong as they have ever been.
